description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: The growing popularity of bobsledding in Germany; a meeting between Chancellor Brandt and President Pompidou; improving relations between the Federal Republic and Democratic Republic; International Green Week; problems of young children in a large city with no recreation space; some examples of modern church architecture; a football match between Argentina and Germany in Munich.
